text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to refer to case law, specifically *U&M Mining Zambia v Konkola Copper Mines (2014)*, to illustrate that English courts may grant freezing injunctions in support of foreign arbitrations where assets are located within their jurisdiction.
